plans

Methods for interacting with the Plans endpoints
https://www.vultr.com/api/#plans
Source:
  • plans.js, line 1

Methods

list(parameters)

Retrieve a list of all active plans. Plans that are no longer available will not be shown.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#plans_plan_list
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
type string <optional>
 The type of plans to return. Possible values: "all", "vc2", "ssd", "vdc2", "dedicated", "vc2z".
Source:
  • plans.js, line 7
